channel.title: Amasaki Shinobu's Website
channel.description:
Amasaki Shinobu's personal activities: Fortran, Parallel Processing, Comptational Geoscience en Amasaki Shinobu https://shinobuamasaki.github.io/feed_en.rss 2024-09-02
https://shinobuamasaki.github.io Welcome to Amasaki Shinobu's Website! https://shinobuamasaki.github.io/img/shinobu.png 512 512 Amasaki Shinobu's icon

Dream of PURE Forgex https://shinobuamasaki.github.io/items/dream-of-pure-regex.html With the next Forgex release, what I want to do. Amasaki Shinobu 2024-07-26
